title: Grey Warwick
body:
I got Grey Warwick from an honor capsule with a Warwick champion permanent
But I don't want Warwick.. (Sorry for all of you who want this skin)
Is it possible to get a refund?

Thanks in advance {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: Heya, this skin is an exclusive reward from honor capsules so there's no refund for it.  If you really don't want it, though, we can remove it from your account via [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) but we can't offer any refund for it.  Sorry!
